snippet: When Hull City manager Mike Phelan writes a Christmas gift list, the first entry might well be a slice of good fortune judging by his side's harsh 1-0 defeat at West Ham United on Saturday....
lead_paragraph: When Hull City manager Mike Phelan writes a Christmas gift list, the first entry might well be a slice of good fortune judging by his side's harsh 1-0 defeat at West Ham United on Saturday.

headline.main: Hull Boss Phelan Wishing for Change of Luck at Christmas
headline.print_headline: Hull Boss Phelan Wishing for Change of Luck at Christmas
